page.title: 02Our Village.
page.content: I like living in Heol-y-Cyw because it is situated in such lovely countryside. Everywhere you look there are fields full of gorgeous flowers and plants. On a warm summer evening you can often see wild animals , especially in the woods on the eastern side of the village. There is plenty of room to play. The roads are quiet and there is little traffic, so we can ride our 'bikes in comparative safety. Although the village is small and lacks the amenities of larger villages and towns,the nearness of Pencoed and Bridgend and the fact that most families have a car does, not make this too much of a problem. The houses are quite attractive and comfortable and most have been built during the last fifty years. (Group C.)
